message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would $15,000 be acceptable?

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is really the lowest I'm willing to go at this point. It represents a fair price considering the value this product offers. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. What do you say?
